params.name: links
params.description: Contains an array of footer link items.

params.name: url
params.description: Href attribute for the footer link item.

params.name: label
params.description: The label of for the footer link item.

params.name: copyright
params.description: Optional text for the copyright notice in the footer.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the footer container.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the footer container.
